name: mBalance
overview: mBalance BV develops messaging software for GSM, UMTS, TDMA, and CDMA mobile operators. It offers products and solutions for message routing, message security, message data management, message billing, message storage, and network access. The companyâ€™s products also include TextPass, which is a short messaging service (SMS) router platform, as well as a multi-protocol SS.7 technology stack; and TextStat, a SMS statistics and testing equipment. In addition, it provides gateway functionality, network querying solutions, and SMS routers and SS.7 appliances for original equipment manufacturers and wireless network operators. The company is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands with an additional regional sales and support office in Singapore, Singapore. As of December 16, 2008, mBalance BV operates as a subsidiary of Tekelec International, SPRL.
